content: Premera Health recently processed a claim for a 72-year-old patient (ID #PX849302) undergoing experimental cryotherapy for advanced soft tissue sarcoma at Harborview Medical Center. The treatment was part of a research partnership with UW Medicine, requiring prior authorization under Policy #CT-8821. Documentation included biopsy reports and a multidisciplinary care plan dated 10/2023. Claims specialist noted unusual billing codes for cryoablation equipment rentals.
